sentences.english: How can the results of data mining be delivered to analysts and employees who need it?
sentences.chinese: 如何将数据挖掘的结果交付给需要它的分析师和雇员？

sentences.english: To start, we will define and fill an employee table.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们将定义和填充一个雇员表。

sentences.english: Some agents have 20-30 employees on a monthly payroll, he said.
sentences.chinese: 一些代理每月会有20至30民雇员，他补充道。

sentences.english: Every employee has five sources of power to draw from.
sentences.chinese: 每个雇员都有五种可以利用的权力资源。

sentences.english: If you do not have a VTCRN / Staff No. , please fill in HKID No…
sentences.chinese: 如你没有职训局雇员编号，请填上香港身份证号码。

sentences.english: Any one of our employees could be the informer .
sentences.chinese: 我们的任何一位雇员都有可能成为告密者。

sentences.english: He thrust the employer out of his office.
sentences.chinese: 他把那个雇员推出办公室。

sentences.english: Are there chances for employees to be transferred to the oversea brach of the company?
sentences.chinese: 雇员有机会到公司设的海外分部工作吗？

sentences.english: Rio state employees and pensioners are owed wages in arrears.
sentences.chinese: 里约州的雇员和退休人员被拖欠了工资和养老金。

sentences.english: But in mos tcompanies these days, a signed statement from the past employee is needed.
sentences.chinese: 现今在大多数的公司里，都会和雇员签署声明。

sentences.english: Any one of our employees could be the informer.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的任罕救嘶位雇员都域许成为告密者。

sentences.english: Employers are prohibited from failing to hire persons in this age group of 40.
sentences.chinese: 雇主不可故意不聘在40岁左右这个年龄段的雇员。

sentences.english: I suggest changing this verse to "In dealing with employees, standards and directions must be clear."
sentences.chinese: 我提议把这句改为“待雇员，规令明”。

sentences.english: Niu Gensheng, a former Yili employee, founded Mengniu in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 前伊利雇员牛根生，在1999年创立蒙牛集团。

sentences.english: Employees from a private company in Chengdu were cleaning up a town around the bend.
sentences.chinese: 在成都，私人公司的雇员们在清理着周边的城镇。

sentences.english: Most employers provide very basic life insurance for all their employees.
sentences.chinese: 多数雇主为他们所有的雇员提供非常基本的人寿保险。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]

pinyin: ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2
